description: Interact with Marvel characters and comics data seamlessly. Fetch character details, comics, and more using the Marvel Developer API. Enhance your applications with rich Marvel content effortlessly.

marvelApiBase.description: The base URL for the Marvel API. Defaults to 'https://gateway.marvel.com/v1/public'.

capabilities.name: get_characters
capabilities.description: Fetch Marvel characters with optional filters.

capabilities.name: get_character_by_id
capabilities.description: Fetch a Marvel character by ID.

capabilities.name: get_comics_for_character
capabilities.description: Fetch Marvel comics filtered by character ID and optional filters.

capabilities.name: get_comics
capabilities.description: Fetches lists of Marvel comics with optional filters.

capabilities.name: get_comic_by_id
capabilities.description: Fetch a single Marvel comic by ID.

capabilities.name: get_characters_for_comic
capabilities.description: Fetch Marvel characters for a given comic.
